feed.title: Karuna 2020 Status
feed.subtitle: Uptime and incident details for Karuna 2020 websites and APIs

entry.title: GitHub Pages scheduled maintenance
entry.content: Our websites were down for less than one hour because of scheduled maintenance on GitHub Pages, the primary host. However, not all traffic was affected because of our CDN layer. Link to incident on GitHub Status: f3xzj5fgfq5b
